definitions.definition: Modifying another word, typically a noun , while in the same phrase.
examples: In "this big house", "big" is attributive , whereas in "this house is big ", it is predicative .
In "this tiger is a man-eater," "man" is an attributive noun.
definitions.label_groups: grammar , of a word or phrase

definitions.definition: Attributing ; characterized by attributing; effecting attribution .

main_definition: ( grammar , of a word or phrase ) Modifying another word, typically a noun , while in the same phrase.
secondary_definitions: Attributing ; characterized by attributing; effecting attribution .
